help-file.title: CUTPURSE
help-file.content:
As their name suggests, the Cutpurse is experienced in the fine art of stealing. They have an enhanced steal and can take off with a targets belongings without being detected. They can also use lightning fast reflexes to strike their target with a high amount of damage. With a trap they can be alerted when an enemy is near.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: Enhanced Steal 36th level: Sneaky Strike 41st level: Quick Step 56th level: Trap
